<main class="wp-block-group entry-content is-layout-constrained wp-container-48" id="wp--skip-link--target">
	
<div class="wp-block-group alignwide is-layout-flow wp-container-13" id="intro" style="padding-top:120px;padding-right:0px;padding-bottom:120px;padding-left:0px">
<div class="wp-block-columns is-layout-flex wp-container-11">
<div class="wp-block-column is-layout-flow" style="flex-basis:80%"><h1 class="wp-block-wporg-random-heading has-heading-cta-font-size">WordPress: Grow your <em>business</em></h1></div>



<div class="wp-block-column is-layout-flow" style="flex-basis:20%"></div>
</div>



<p class="is-style-short-text">Create a place for your business, your interests, or anything else—with the open source platform that powers the web.</p>



<div class="wp-block-buttons is-layout-flex">
<div class="wp-block-button"><a class="wp-block-button__link wp-element-button" href="/download/">Get WordPress</a></div>
</div>
</div>



<div class="wp-block-wporg-language-suggest alignfull"><div id="lang-guess">WordPress is also available in <a href="https://kn.wordpress.org/">ಕನ್ನಡ</a> (also <a href="https://ne.wordpress.org/">Nepali</a>).</div></div>



<div class="wp-block-cover alignfull" style="padding-top:80px;padding-right:0px;padding-bottom:80px;padding-left:0px;min-height:670px" id="editor"><span aria-hidden="true" class="wp-block-cover__background has-background-dim-0 has-background-dim"></span><img decoding="async" class="wp-block-cover__image-background wp-image-11558" alt="" src="https://wordpress.org/files/2022/08/Editor.webp" data-object-fit="cover"><div class="wp-block-cover__inner-container">
<div class="wp-elements-b596785c959622e4aa2d1522a076490a wp-block-group has-white-color has-text-color has-link-color is-layout-constrained wp-container-14">
<h2 class="has-text-align-right has-pomegrade-3-color has-text-color has-heading-cta-font-size">Dream it, build it</h2>



<p class="is-style-short-text">That’s the beauty of using blocks. See exactly how your site will look in real time, even as you add, edit, and rearrange your content. Create any kind of custom site with intuitive editing, flexible design tools, and powerful features to manage it all.</p>



<p><a rel="noreferrer noopener" href="/gutenberg/" target="_blank">Explore the WordPress Editor ↗︎</a></p>
</div>
</div></div>



<div class="wp-block-group alignfull has-blueberry-4-background-color has-background is-layout-constrained" id="benefits" style="padding-top:80px;padding-bottom:80px">
<div class="wp-block-columns alignwide is-layout-flex wp-container-17">
<div class="wp-block-column is-layout-flow">
<h2 class="has-heading-2-font-size" style="margin-right:100px;margin-bottom:40px">Powerful and empowering</h2>



<figure class="wp-block-image size-full"><a href="https://wordpress.org/themes/"><img decoding="async" loading="lazy" width="960" height="601" src="https://wordpress.org/files/2022/08/theme-styles.png" alt="An illustration showing a grid of different type styles and color options, with a cursor arrow making a selection." class="wp-image-11481" srcset="https://i0.wp.com/wordpress.org/files/2022/08/theme-styles.png?w=960&ssl=1 960w, https://i0.wp.com/wordpress.org/files/2022/08/theme-styles.png?resize=300%2C188&ssl=1 300w, https://i0.wp.com/wordpress.org/files/2022/08/theme-styles.png?resize=768%2C481&ssl=1 768w" sizes="(max-width: 960px) 100vw, 960px"></a></figure>
</div>



<div class="wp-block-column is-layout-flow wp-container-16">
<p class="has-large-font-size"><strong>Style it your way</strong></p>



<p class="is-style-short-text">Design anything you imagine. Start with a blank canvas or choose from a wide variety of <a href="https://wordpress.org/themes/">themes</a> and <a href="https://wordpress.org/patterns/">patterns</a>. Customize every detail, from color and fonts to layouts and functionality.</p>



<div style="height:20px" aria-hidden="true" class="wp-block-spacer"></div>



<p class="has-large-font-size"><strong>Plug in and extend</strong></p>



<p class="is-style-short-text">Make WordPress do whatever you need it to. Add a store, mailing list, portfolio, social feed, analytics; you’re in control with over 55,000 plugins.</p>



<div style="height:20px" aria-hidden="true" class="wp-block-spacer"></div>



<p class="has-large-font-size"><strong>Own what you make </strong></p>



<p class="is-style-short-text">Your content, your design, and your data always belong to you. With WordPress you’re free to tell your story, grow your brand, or simply be yourself.</p>



<div style="height:20px" aria-hidden="true" class="wp-block-spacer"></div>



<p class="has-large-font-size"><strong>Create with confidence</strong></p>



<p class="is-style-short-text">Built by an open source community with decades of experience, its passionate contributors are committed to keeping WordPress as stable and secure as possible.</p>
</div>
</div>
</div>



<div class="wp-elements-d72f8e7859c861c05dad7fdcca6a3f77 wp-block-group alignfull has-white-color has-charcoal-1-background-color has-text-color has-background has-link-color is-layout-constrained" id="showcase" style="padding-top:80px">
<div class="wp-block-group alignwide is-layout-flow wp-container-22">
<h2 class="has-heading-2-font-size">One platform, millions of possibilities</h2>



<div class="wp-block-columns is-layout-flex wp-container-21">
<div class="wp-block-column is-layout-flow" style="flex-basis:40%">
<p class="is-style-short-text">Global creative agencies, local businesses, and even your neighbor’s personal blog are already using WordPress.</p>
</div>



<div class="wp-block-column is-layout-flow" style="flex-basis:60%"></div>
</div>
</div>



<div class="wp-block-group alignwide is-content-justification-space-between is-layout-flex wp-container-23" style="margin-top:50px;margin-bottom:50px">

<div class="wp-block-columns alignwide is-layout-flex wp-container-30">
<div class="wp-block-column is-layout-flow">
<h2 class="has-heading-2-font-size">Build for yourself,<br>not by yourself</h2>



<p class="is-style-short-text">Whether you’re an entrepreneur, professional developer, or first-time blogger, there’s a library of resources and learning tools ready for you. Plus, you have the whole WordPress community in your corner.</p>
</div>



<div class="wp-block-column is-layout-flow">
<ul class="is-style-links-list">
<li><a href="https://learn.wordpress.org/">Learn with WordPress ↗︎</a></li>



<li><a href="https://wordpress.org/support/">Find support ↗︎</a></li>



<li><a href="https://developer.wordpress.org/">Dig into the code ↗︎</a></li>



<li><a href="https://www.meetup.com/pro/wordpress/">Meet local WordPress users ↗︎</a></li>
</ul>
</div>
</div>
</div>



<div class="wp-elements-dc520010d728effa4ab524c6e5659fbd wp-block-group alignfull has-blueberry-1-color has-light-grey-2-background-color has-text-color has-background has-link-color is-layout-constrained" id="community" style="padding-bottom:100px">

<h2 class="alignwide has-heading-cta-font-size" style="margin-bottom:40px"><em>Community</em> at its core</h2>



<div class="wp-block-columns alignwide is-layout-flex wp-container-36">
<div class="wp-block-column is-layout-flow" style="flex-basis:33%"></div>



<div class="wp-block-column is-layout-flow" style="flex-basis:50%">
<p class="is-style-short-text">Behind the technology is a diverse collective of people, collaborating from around the world. We’re united by the spirit of open source, and the freedom to build, transform, and share without barriers. </p>



<p class="is-style-short-text">From writing code and testing, to community outreach and translation, there are so many ways to contribute and everyone is welcome. Let’s shape the future of the web together. </p>



<div class="wp-block-buttons is-content-justification-left is-layout-flex wp-container-33">

</div>
</div>



<div class="wp-block-column is-layout-flow" style="flex-basis:16%"></div>
</div>
</div>

		<style id="skip-link-styles">
		.skip-link.screen-reader-text {
			border: 0;
			clip: rect(1px,1px,1px,1px);
			clip-path: inset(50%);
			height: 1px;
			margin: -1px;
			overflow: hidden;
			padding: 0;
			position: absolute !important;
			width: 1px;
			word-wrap: normal !important;
		}

		.skip-link.screen-reader-text:focus {
			background-color: #eee;
			clip: auto !important;
			clip-path: none;
			color: #444;
			display: block;
			font-size: 1em;
			height: auto;
			left: 5px;
			line-height: normal;
			padding: 15px 23px 14px;
			text-decoration: none;
			top: 5px;
			width: auto;
			z-index: 100000;
		}
	</style>
		<script>
	( function() {
		var skipLinkTarget = document.querySelector( 'main' ),
			sibling,
			skipLinkTargetID,
			skipLink;

		// Early exit if a skip-link target can't be located.
		if ( ! skipLinkTarget ) {
			return;
		}

		// Get the site wrapper.
		// The skip-link will be injected in the beginning of it.
		sibling = document.querySelector( '.wp-site-blocks' );

		// Early exit if the root element was not found.
		if ( ! sibling ) {
			return;
		}

		// Get the skip-link target's ID, and generate one if it doesn't exist.
		skipLinkTargetID = skipLinkTarget.id;
		if ( ! skipLinkTargetID ) {
			skipLinkTargetID = 'wp--skip-link--target';
			skipLinkTarget.id = skipLinkTargetID;
		}

		// Create the skip link.
		skipLink = document.createElement( 'a' );
		skipLink.classList.add( 'skip-link', 'screen-reader-text' );
		skipLink.href = '#' + skipLinkTargetID;
		skipLink.innerHTML = 'Skip to content';

		// Inject the skip link.
		sibling.parentElement.insertBefore( skipLink, sibling );
	}() );
	</script>
